Producteev Package¶

producteev Package¶

Producteev API library for Python.

core Module¶

exception producteev.core.AuthError(message, response=None)[source]¶

Bases: producteev.core.ProducteevError

class producteev.core.Producteev(api_key, secret)[source]¶
BASE_URL = 'https://api.producteev.com/'¶
call(path, **params)[source]¶

Call to a Producteev API method, with any path of here and the required param for the method.

Example:
call(‘users/view’, id_colleague=1234)
get_time()[source]¶

Get time from Producteev server.

login(email, password)[source]¶

Login user to Producteev.

utils Module¶

producteev.utils.unescape(text)[source]¶

Removes HTML or XML character references and entities from a text string.

text – The HTML (or XML) source text. return – The plain text, as a Unicode string, if necessary.
